channel.title: Destiny
channel.description: It's freaking amazing. Has anyone had the chance to get it?

[quote=“peroxides, post:41, topic:546618”]I got mythoclast by lucky push of atheon before patch =p (hard mode of course)[/quote]Done the raid (LEGIT) 16 times now and yet to get it. Its quite annoying.

item.title: Destiny
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“peroxides, post:39, topic:546618”]I’m working on my third character now. I have 2 29s, one a warlock, one a hunter. Just need my titan to level up now and then it will be the usual dailies, and weekly strikes, weekly nightfall and raids until DLC comes out. I bought limited edition so both Crotas End and Dark Below came with the purchase. Though Crotas end isn’t coming with a lot of content, it will still be fun to play something new. Lucky for playstation gamers that get that one extra strike (kind of jealous). I’m on xbox 360 here.

I’m pretty happy with the game. Its one of the best console games I’ve ever played. Of course it can be better and there are many ways they can make it better. But I will give them until the second DLC that comes out to see if I still want to play afterwards.[/quote]Not playing until the weekly reset in 6 hours. Hit level 30 on all my characters with all maxed sub classes and now just playing to get the mythoclast and any other exotic they want to throw my way.

Read full topic

item.title: Destiny
item.dc:creator: @peroxides peroxides
item.description:
@peroxides wrote:

I’m working on my third character now. I have 2 29s, one a warlock, one a hunter. Just need my titan to level up now and then it will be the usual dailies, and weekly strikes, weekly nightfall and raids until DLC comes out. I bought limited edition so both Crotas End and Dark Below came with the purchase. Though Crotas end isn’t coming with a lot of content, it will still be fun to play something new. Lucky for playstation gamers that get that one extra strike (kind of jealous). I’m on xbox 360 here.

I’m pretty happy with the game. Its one of the best console games I’ve ever played. Of course it can be better and there are many ways they can make it better. But I will give them until the second DLC that comes out to see if I still want to play afterwards.

Read full topic

item.title: Destiny
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

The story was not so bad, I was actually expecting the to make different storylines for each class but that didn’t do so well in that. And the multiplayer was decent, I don’t know what else could be done to make it “amazing”. Last but not least, I have gotten to Hunter: Level 26 and after that, I’m tired of all the bounties being the same thing over-and-over, and all of the patrol missions being the same after a while.

I’ve not been on the game in at least three weeks so I’m not sure what’s changed since then but it was fantastic when you first get it but not so much now lol, I still love the game but more stuff needs to be done with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Destiny
item.dc:creator: @malikz malikz
item.description:
@malikz wrote:

Games pretty repetitive…got to level 28 and kind of just stopped playing…next DLC you have to pay for (really?). They couldn’t make the first DLC free…? Considering how broken the game feels right now?

Anyways, I don’t have much of a desire to play anymore. That’s my opinion after weeks of gameplay.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

The raid is extremely fun to replay time and time again. It amount of coordination and teamwork and communication is unprecedented in the gaming community. It is easily the hardest raid out right now in any raiding gaming community.

item.title: Destiny
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Adam200214, post:18, topic:546618”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=665515.msg4449112#msg4449112 date=1410363819]
I feel like its a mix of Halo and Counter strike. There is a lot of strategy to the game and most the guns aren’t too OP. Got to level 11 in my first 10 hours of playing! Here is to another 10 levels or so!
[/quote]
Makers of Halo and cod made it, that’s probs where you got it from.[/quote]I already knew that, and no thats not why. I could make this assumption that the makers of halo had a part in the design of this game. In fact, Bungie made it, not the makers of CoD. The makers of CoD were the publishers.

Read full topic

item.description:

RiiPiiNFtW:

I feel like its a mix of Halo and Counter strike. There is a lot of strategy to the game and most the guns aren’t too OP. Got to level 11 in my first 10 hours of playing! Here is to another 10 levels or so!

Makers of Halo and cod made it, that’s probs where you got it from.
